text:
hi everybody this is mr. Duncan in
England how are you today? are you ok?

I hope so
are you hap hap hap hap happy? I hope so

well it's been a long time since I made
a video but I do have a good reason for

it
I have now moved house some of you may

already be aware of this if you have
been following me on Facebook but just

in case you haven't Here I am in my new
home I have been busy setting up my new

studio
I've been busy stripping wallpaper

smashing up old furniture and painting
walls which has kept me very busy so

because I've been doing lots of
decorating I haven't had much time to

concentrate on my work which is of
course teaching English to you so um

this short message is just a little
thing that I have thrown together to say

hello and I haven't forgotten about you
at all because I have received a few

messages saying hey mr. Denker where are
you we haven't seen you for a long time

where are your new lessons have you left
us well I haven't left you in fact it's

quite the opposite I will be back very
soon with many more new lessons lots of

exciting subjects many more word stop
episodes and also regular episodes of

ask mr. Duncan as well oh I'm so excited
I think I do too we me myself no not

really
hmm so that's it for me and I will let

you carry on so don't worry I haven't
forgotten about you I will be here soon

with many more lessons many more
SuperDuper videos just for you until

then I will continue decorating and
painting and making my studio all lovely

and clean so this is mr. Duncan having
moved how

in Much Wenlock yes that's where remove
- do you remember last year I made a

lesson in Much Wenlock and Here I am now
living here so even though I'm making my

lessons the work I do affects me as well
as you because here I am now living in

much Wenlock I can't believe it even I
can't believe it it's like some sort of

dream let's hope it doesn't turn into a
nightmare it may do knowing me anyway

I'm talking far too much I should now
cut because I don't have any editing

software at the moment because my
computer and my studio is all packed

away so I will go and I will let you
carry on with your day this is mr. danke

newly moved to much Wenlock in england
saying thank you for watching me talking

to you and admiring the view look at
that isn't that nice

that's Shropshire over there
all of that is Shropshire it's lovely
this is mr. Duncan saying ta ta for now 8-)
